title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Book excerpt: "My Beloved" by Jan Karon
items.description: The New York Times bestselling author returns to the village of Mitford in her 15th novel featuring Father Tim Kavanagh.

items.title: Shops empty in a Hispanic neighborhood as immigration crackdown comes to Louisiana
items.description: Federal border agents have descended on a Hispanic enclave just outside New Orleans and local business owners are suffering.

items.title: This week on "Sunday Morning" (Dec. 7)
items.description: A look at the features for this week's broadcast of the Emmy-winning program, hosted by Jane Pauley.

items.title: Netflix wins bidding war for Warner Bros. purchase
items.description: Netflix announced a deal to buy Warner Bros. for $82.7 billion. Barron's writer Paul La Monica joins CBS News with more.

items.title: Coldest temperatures of the season hit Midwest, Northeast
items.description: The coldest air of the season is invading the Midwest and Northeast as the Mid-Atlantic sees its first snow of the season.

items.title: WATCH:  Trumps attend National Christmas Tree Lighting Ceremony
items.description: President Trump wished the nation a "Merry Christmas" during Thursday night's National Christmas Tree lighting ceremony in Washington, D.C.

items.description: U.S. consumers’ mood improved slightly this month, with worries about inflation easing a bit, but remains gloomy
